original_text: And he lift up his eyes and looked, and, lo, three men stood by him: and when he saw them, he ran to meet them from the tent door, and bowed himself toward the ground,
korean_text: 눈을 들어 본즉 사람 셋이 맞은편에 서 있는지라 그가 그들을 보자 곧 장막 문에서 달려나가 영접하며 몸을 땅에 굽혀

sentences.original_text: And he lift up his eyes and looked,
and, lo, three men stood by him:
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 세 사람이 그에게 서 있었으며

sentences.original_text: he ran to meet them from the tent door,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 장막 문에서 그들을 맞이하러 달려가며

sentences.original_text: and bowed himself toward the ground,
